message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the security challenges in IoT networks and proposes the use of machine learning and deep learning techniques to address these challenges. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper extensively discusses the use of ML and DL techniques, which makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely categories as well. The paper also discusses the heterogeneity and resource constraints of IoT devices, which falls under the category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Finally, the paper discusses the future research directions for ML- and DL-based IoT security, which falls under the category of cs.SE (Software Engineering).
